ProjectTitle: Assessing myocardial stiffness in presence of a left bundle branch block using active shear waves and ultra-high frame rate echocardiography
InitialFeedbackHistory: 26/07/2024 [REDACTED] please note that using hard disks gives a high risk of data loss, please have to look at the storage guide for alternatives (https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en) or contact your local IT team. Please ensure that your long-term storage solution follows the regulations for clinical studies, for more information contact ctc@uzleuven.be [REDACTED] since you work with patient data privacy will be a factor restricting sharing, make sure you share data only after signing a data transfer agreement; you can only use a CC-BY licence for open data
label: good with suggestions
